search.query: | stats count | eval index="$index_tok$" | eval host="$host_tok$" | eval lateSecs=0 | eval suppressUntil=0 | eval date=strftime(now(),"%Y%m%d") | eval comments=date." - suppressed from dashboard" | fields - count | append [| inputlookup expectedTime] | table index,host,lateSecs,suppressUntil,contact,comments | outputlookup expectedTime

| dbinspect index=* | dedup index | map search="metadata type=hosts index=$$index$$ | eval index=\"$$index$$\"" maxsearches=1000 | lookup expectedTime index,host OUTPUT lateSecs | eval lateSecs=mvindex(lateSecs,0) | eval critical=if(lateSecs>0 AND lateSecs<14399,1,0) | eval now=now() | eval seconds_since_last_event = now - recentTime | eval minutes_since_last_event = round(seconds_since_last_event/60,2) | where critical=1 AND seconds_since_last_event < `ignore_after` | table minutes_since_last_event host index | sort - minutes_since_last_event | rename minutes_since_last_event AS "Minutes Since Last Event" host AS "Event Host" index AS "Event Index"

| dbinspect index=* | dedup index | map search="metadata type=hosts index=$$index$$ | eval index=\"$$index$$\"" maxsearches=1000 | lookup expectedTime index,host OUTPUT lateSecs | eval lateSecs=mvindex(lateSecs,0) | eval hidden=if(lateSecs=0,1,0) | search hidden=0 | eval now=now() | eval Suppress="Suppress" | eval seconds_since_last_event = now - recentTime| eval minutes_since_last_event = round(seconds_since_last_event/60,2) | where seconds_since_last_event < `ignore_after` | eval h=host | eval i=index| table minutes_since_last_event Suppress h i host index | sort - minutes_since_last_event | rename minutes_since_last_event AS "Minutes Since Last Event" h AS "Event Host" i AS "Event Index"
